    • setPassword

      Set password for the user
      Parameters:
      userID - -> userID of user logging in
      newPassword - -> Password of user logging in
      Returns:
      -> whether password is set or not
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException
      PasswordMatchedOldException
      PasswordIsWeakException

      UserNotFoundException
